fixes.name: Fixed Specials
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR _param = SELECTEDVALUE('Specials spread'[Display As])
RETURN
CALCULATE(
    MAXX(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)',
        IF(
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Coll Spread] > _param,
            1,
            0
        )
    ),
    ALLEXCEPT(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)',
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate],
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[isin]
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Recreated the FIXED LOD by computing the row-level condition (Coll Spread > parameter) and taking the MAX per RpDate and isin using CALCULATE with ALLEXCEPT and MAXX. The parameter [Parameters].[Specials spread] is mapped to SELECTEDVALUE('Specials spread'[Display As]).
fixes.type_changed_reason: The Tableau expression is a FIXED LOD ({ FIXED ... }) which performs aggregation across groups (RpDate, isin) and it references a parameter; such context-aware logic must be implemented as a measure in DAX.
